website_summaries.verdict: A nice little fridge you can plug in on the deck and use to keep your drinks cool all summer long.
pros: 4.5 foot cubic capacity is a nice size for holding drinks and snacks
Door can be mounted to open left or right
cons: Cannot be used in a permanent installation situation, like under a deck in an outdoor kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Poor cooling abilities
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived and we have been really disappointed with it since using it. We installed it according to the manf instructions and it does not cool properly. We put room temperature beers in there yesterday morning and they still are not COLD. There is also water pooling in the center of the fridge that appears to be condensation. I would like to return the product but do not have the original packaging so I don't want to pay to have it packed at a UPS facility for a product that is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Voigt

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR OUTDOOR USE
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking refrigerator but I think I was misled because it is "Bull Outdoor Product". You would think that anything bought from them would be outdoor but after receiving this, it does not appear to be durable enough for outdoors. I am extremely disappointed and will probably be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Brundage

customer_reviews.title: Is this really for an outdoor kitchen?
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived damaged (see photo). I was disappointed but decided to keep it because I need it for the holidays. I planned to build it into an outdoor kitchen as shown in the photo that is in the Amazon listing, but it clearly says on the back that it is to be free standing only, meaning that it can’t be built in to a standard opening. Now I’m wondering if it is actually rated for outdoor use. If not, this was twice the price of a similar low end refrigerator at the local big box store. Not a very happy customer....
customer_reviews.author: Dr Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: Not good for an outdoor product. It's in an outdoor kitchen, so it's shielded from the elements but it lasted less than 18 months. For the price, I expected more than that.
customer_reviews.author: D in OK

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a new one after the previous same one lasted 5 years. It works very well for the price. Set it at 6 to get it freezing and then back off to around 4 to prevent frosting on the inside rear. There isn’t perfect coverage - as drinks in the center-rear will tend to freeze at the coldest setting, but perfect for a weekend party.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coburn

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these that I have owned. Shame on me for being dumb enough to buy another one after the first stopped working. I bought the second one in 2018--it has already stopped working. Used it outside for drinks only. It was decent enough to keep drinks relatively cold, but stopped working after use of no more than 6 months. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!! I will spend extra money and get a better rated outdoor fridge.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product, don't waist your time.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I've tried to give it a chance, I had this indoors for 1 week before I decided to return it, I've done things by the instructions manual and still It doesn't cool enough beverages, after 3 days or more being beverages inside the fridge they are slightly cold, the cooling set of 6 aka max, is not powerful enough to provide a cold beverage.
customer_reviews.author: Hernan Turtula

customer_reviews.title: Poor cooling quality
customer_reviews.text: This product suppose to be for a outdoor kitchen. So it should be cool even out doors , however it does not the items in the fridge is luke warm all the time. you have to leave them in there for long periods of time before they will be cold. Not good for Texas weather.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great for the outdoor kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Exact replacement for ours which stopped working one day. Beware that there is a difference between any old mini refrigerator and a refrigerator that's built specifically to be left outdoors. This one is an outdoor refrigerator, and therefore more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Broadway Bound

customer_reviews.title: making sure this product performs as a reliable product
customer_reviews.text: JUST RECEIVED THE Bull outdoor rated refrigerator. Looks nice and followed directions as plugging in 24 hours prior at suggested temperature setting. Stocked the refrigerator with beverages and so far is cooling. Didn't rate for energy efficiency or temperature control due to the short time of ownership. We shall see. Believe me if this product does not perform will let you know. Requesting an overall rating is premature at this time because I'm not sure of performance. How can you request this rating is not sure of the performance. I think this rating may not reflect the actual performance.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new beer fridge because my original Bull fridge died. The no freezer feature is also what I needed but the racks are not very useful for beer or other cylindrical drinks because of the poor spacing. Original fridge did last over 15 years however.
customer_reviews.author: WA

customer_reviews.title: Bull outdoor fridge
customer_reviews.text: Just do not put non alcoholic beverages in here if you plan on keeping it on the coldest setting. The back of the fridge on the inside built up frost and froze the soda bottles while the beer was awesome. Non alcoholic drinks are best on the 3-4 setting while alcohol was best on 5, the highest
customer_reviews.author: Diedra

customer_reviews.title: Cool but not COLD
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the refrigerator 2 months ago for my outdoor BBQ island. I monitor the temp early on the temp never dipped before 51 degrees, I was hoping it would get to 35-40 degrees to keep beverages cold. It never has ... disappointing in the BULL Refrigerator for the price and all the hype
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barely Used three seasons and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this August of 2016 and had barely gotten any use out of it. We had it in our outdoor bar area, covered and protected. Brought it in during the cold months. This year it worked for a couple of weeks after we brought it back out and then it just stopped cooling. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Cool. Poor Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Held for a short time before use due to delays in finishing patio. Once we installed and started to use it never got up to an appropriate temperature. Of course we were past return period. I’ve lived with it for a few years but now will replace. Huge let down. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A. Ferrante

customer_reviews.title: doesn't get super cold
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews that the fridge doesn't get really cold.. they were right... it gets "cold enough to drink" but not as cold as I hoped. I guess it will work for now. Once it breaks, I won't replace with the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor fridge
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Replaced an older Bull fridge that was used for about 8 years, fits perfectly. Keeps the beer very cold!
customer_reviews.author: vs1

customer_reviews.title: Our BULL refrigerator stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this refrigerator to use outside in May, 2019. It is Oct., 2020 and it has stopped working. It is ridiculous to spend over $300.00 for a small refrigerator that lasts only a year and a half. It stopped keeping our coke/beer cold and that was the end of the refrigerator. So disappointed that we now have to buy a new one, but not a BULL!
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: 2 day review
customer_reviews.text: I received the fridge as scheduled. No damage. Proceeded to bring it to my pool area ( totally exposed to the elements) and fill it with some water bottles and of course beer. I set the gauge to max of 6 and as stated in the instructions within 2 hours the water was COLD. BTW it was 90 degrees and very humid. Last night it poured for 3 hours and the fridge is still working great. Today the water is somewhat frozen so I'll back it down to a 4. But so far so good. Very pleased and surprised considering the high heat.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd in 5 years. Its the only thing that fits in the space. The door fell off after a week of use
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Goods
customer_reviews.text: Second delivery on this product. First delivery: top corner crushed, returned... Second delivery: top corner dent and now a second dent on side :-( Do I attempt a third?
customer_reviews.author: Robin Laveaux

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient cooling capacity
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator lacks adequate cooling capacity. Installed in outdoor kitchen, filled with wine and beer, set dial to maximum, and it barely -- BARELY -- reaches drinking temperature. I should have listened to poor reviewers. Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: matthew s. conant

customer_reviews.title: Not cold enough
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to compliment my Lonestar built in grill. Outside covered under counter install. Unit will cool to 42 which is not cold enough. I just ordered a 24 inch that has cooling circulation and will chill to 34degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F

customer_reviews.title: The bull name is known in the market palce.
customer_reviews.text: We are a appliance repair company. This purchase was a replacement for one of our clients, they love the product, easy to install and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dana L. Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an outdoor kitchen to match our other Bull grill and accessories and IT DOESN’T WORK! Was barely cool when we first started using it so adjusted the setting a couple times but a month later and now it doesn’t cool AT ALL! How can I return this and get my money back???
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my deck and bull appliances Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my deck and bull appliances Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Hughes

customer_reviews.title: New Bull refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This one replaced my original Bull outdoor refrigerator that I owned for 7 years. The old one still cooled, but would not shut off. All in all not bad after 7 years in Tucson, Arizona outside all year round. It got so hot during the summer that some of the plastic on the refrigerator melted.
customer_reviews.author: Corgi

customer_reviews.title: Not a true outdoor fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed ,only lasted 2 years. I don’t believe it’s a true outdoor fridge as it is advertised for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking product
customer_reviews.text: The size is great and since it’s used outdoor our previous one which same brand and size lasted only 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lamis Fleischer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my beer cold
customer_reviews.text: This will keep your beers nice and cold, you could also use as a freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazn junki

customer_reviews.title: fast ship
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly, good value for outdoor refrig. Cools as you would want.
customer_reviews.author: EddieA

customer_reviews.title: Great condition
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered securely and had no signs of damage. We will see how well it holds up over time, but feel good about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ofdjeff

customer_reviews.title: though the second unit is working great. Replacing a 15 year old outdoor min-frig (5-8 ...
customer_reviews.text: took two attempts, though the second unit is working great. Replacing a 15 year old outdoor min-frig (5-8 years avg life). First Bull made rattling noise (compressor) and was returned. Replacement unit very quiet, cold, working fine...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeping beer chilled
customer_reviews.text: Thus is an exact tepkCement for our outdoor fridge. Last one worked for 8 years. The price is so reasonable and the fridge is unreliable Just plug in set controls as described and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kosmo's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor fridge works very well even in Atlanta! On very humid & hot days it does struggle the tiniest bit and has condensation on the door & sides. It would also be nice if the shelves were solid instead of wire & had some adjustability. Other than that, good storage capability & happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. B.

customer_reviews.title: It is everything it says it is. AND that ...
customer_reviews.text: It is everything it says it is. AND that includes NOT frost free. I did not realize that. I do now. They didn't say it was & I didn't catch it. Now you know.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Connell

customer_reviews.title: Great except if main use is for beverages.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great, except the wire shelving deflects too much when loaded with beverages and the spacing is too wide for aluminum cans.
customer_reviews.author: Wexford

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the same item that lasted for 10 years. It looks good, I like the design inside and it has proven to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Go so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. used outside under a bbq counter. keeps it cold
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kang

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cool to standard.
customer_reviews.text: Size was correct but doesn’t cool below 42 degrees. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just get the $150 fridge from Costco
customer_reviews.text: Kept my beer ice cold for just over a year. This happened to be my second Bull fridge. My first one lasted about the same duration and I thought maybe I'd give Bull another chance. Not this time. Looks like I'll be remodeling my outdoor kitchen this winter to accommodate a cheapo fridge from Costco that will last 15 plus years and keep my beer cold.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Fridge
customer_reviews.text: I got this unit to replace an identical one I got in 2013, this new one does not get as cool as the old one. It keeps inside cold around 40F. But it is not able to freeze as the old one.
customer_reviews.author: WILMER FINOL

customer_reviews.title: Beat the Florida Summer Heat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great refrigerator and has keep my drinks cold on the patio all summer long here in Florida. I was worried with out heat, but it has not been an issue for this great refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Leo’s

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: The fridge died after six weeks and it was not eligible for a refund. We are extremely disappointed. We will never buy a product made by Bull again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ozkan

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fridge won’t keep beer cold and the seller won’t take it back unless I box it up and pay return freight. Stay away..it’s a rip off
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cardinal

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Looks great on my island and performs better then I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: it's a great little fridge, but even though it seemed packed well, it arrived dented. And being that the outside is stainless steel, you see every nick and spot.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha Aponte de Roeck

customer_reviews.title: Works great outdoors so far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fridge. Working ok outdoors on the back of a boat. Beer is really cold. Looks smart.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bush

customer_reviews.title: Our Outside Kitchen came with Bull.
customer_reviews.text: This Bull does a good job especially due to the fact it faces the incredibly Hot sun. We have to remember to adjust temp. for summer and winter.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis C.

customer_reviews.title: Often problems- no longer working after two years
customer_reviews.text: Died within two years.... not worth money- do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stehlik

customer_reviews.title: Good for price.
customer_reviews.text: Drawer inside is not on a track it just sits in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Love this refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Love this refrigerator. The optional left or right door mounting side came in real handy. I had to switch it from right to left. Stays very cold, even in the summer heat in Oklahoma. This is on my patio in our newly built outdoor kitchen. It gets hit with a little rain and sunshine since it is partially covered. So far it has seen the summer heat, heavy rain, and now winter elements. Looks to be going strong. A good unit without spending in the $1000 range for high end outdoor refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Arley

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it cool!
customer_reviews.text: We have this refrigerator outside our camper at a seasonal site and it has seen lots of rain and wind thus far this season but has held its temperature great and the stainless is easy to clean. I thought that it would have a little freezer compartment but it doesn't. We save a lot of space in our indoor fridge by using the outdoor one for drinks and mixers. It's spacious enough to hold dozens of bottles of water, cans of soda, and big bottles of mixers.
customer_reviews.author: Minya Lynch

customer_reviews.title: refrigator
customer_reviews.text: I placed this unit out in my outdoor kitchen and it works great. This is my second unit that i had. My last unit lasted seven years.
customer_reviews.author: mr.Fredc1

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for outdoor frig. No freezer keeps bottled drinks very cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: The wire shelves were not sturdy enough for 12 cans
customer_reviews.text: The size fit perfectly for the built in bar on patio. I use it for beverages. The wire shelves were not sturdy enough for 12 cans, so I had glass shelves made to fit. Now it's very efficient
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Bosse

customer_reviews.title: ... on the side but other than that is in excellent
customer_reviews.text: It had a dent on the side but other than that is in excellent condition
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Was a great addition to my outdoor BBQ island
customer_reviews.text: Was a great addition to my outdoor BBQ island. Has been up and running for a while now and I have no complaints. Doesn't seem to use a lot of power (didn't notice it on my bill) and keeps all the drinks icy-cold poolside. Stainless finish on the door has been easy to clean, however I don't live in a place where we get a lot of rain (Southern California) so water spots haven't been an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dobie

customer_reviews.title: Not as cold as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed does not keep the stuff cold enough
customer_reviews.author: havasugrl

customer_reviews.title: Outside
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor refrigerator really does its job well. Keeps drinks really cold and looks great! Holds a lot of drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Erdmann

customer_reviews.title: Nice refrigerator and good inside size and options with adjustable ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice refrigerator and good inside size and options with adjustable shelves. The door can dispenser really doesn't work. Nothing at the bottom to keep cans from falling out. You can load the dispenser but when you open the door, cans fall out the bottom. Also, we needed to change the side the door opened. That should be a simple procedure but none of the holes lined up with the bracket. We had to use longer screws to force it. Looks great in our outdoor bar.
customer_reviews.author: BurR

customer_reviews.title: Great refrigerator for our outdoor bar.  Holds about  4 cases.  This is our second one.  Our first lasted about 5 years.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Keeps everything so cold. It is quiet and it has a nice capacity. We s Can store bottles and cans almost 4 cases.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Macho

customer_reviews.title: Not such a good deal after all
customer_reviews.text: delivered with dents in side which would be ok since it will be built into outdoor cabinet BUT it does not work - compressor heats up but unit does not even get cool let alone cold - orderded replacement so hopefully I'll be able to update this review with a more positive outlook . Had to destroy box to get it out so Amazon needs to send new box.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and stays cold even in our hot weather
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and stays cold even in our hot weather. Our location is not shaded and we are in So CA. Matches the other Bull stainless products we installed like the drawers etc. nice addition to our outdoor living space.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: COLD
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Our last Bull Outdoor fridge lasted almost 10 years outside in 100+ degree weather. This replacement is so cold even in the high Summer temperatures that the soda cans started exploding at the coldest setting. Great Fridge and holds its aesthetics becuase its real metal door, not metal looking plastic. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D.

customer_reviews.title: An not happy my last one only lasted 3 seasons
customer_reviews.text: Am not happy my last one only lasted 3 seasons. For twice the price of a regular indoor unit you would think it would have lasted longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy in PTC
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. This item was delivered on Jan 19, 2017. I sent an email letting Anazon know that there were dings in outside and got no response. Plugged in and it worked and so me decided to keep. Now, it runs but does not cool. Didn't even get 6 months out of it.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This replaces the original one that came with our outdoor bbq. We were misinformed about it's weather protection. Works fine for our summer bbq's but this year we will take it out and store it indoors when the weather turns cold and wet.
customer_reviews.author: egaildee

customer_reviews.title: Door issues, dent in the side, and it's noisy. I would not purchase this item again...
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time... with a good size dent in the side or the fridge... The door would not close properly. I figured out the problem ... The screws holding the door (on the top) were stripped out and could not be tightened. The door is reversible so I swapped it over and it now works. I have it on our deck at our cabin. Good thing it is outside because it is pretty noisy. I will work for the cabin but I would not have it at my home.
customer_reviews.author: Mista Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a few months ago. Today i finally got to finishing up my outdoor kitchen and I took the refrigerator out of the box and plugged it in. It made a very loud noise. After examining the product I found a large dent in the compressor. The box did not appear to be damaged to it but it was apparent this product was repackaged.
customer_reviews.author: dimitri k

customer_reviews.title: Bull outdoor product
customer_reviews.text: This product came with a dent in it. I was warned by other reviews on line. It works fine and since it is outside under a counter we decided to keep it. Not knowing what the next one might look like.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator only is great as it creates more room for beverages. Glass shelving would be better than the wire one.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B

customer_reviews.title: Started off good, but died after 16 months...
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service ! Product works as advertised. Even though it's outside, keeps everything really cold UPDATE - 16 months later - Fridge is DEAD... Worked one summer and out of no where the item is no longer working.
customer_reviews.author: EdF

customer_reviews.title: stainless steel door rusts easily
customer_reviews.text: we have had this product less than 2 years i our outside bbq and before year one was reached the front of the refrigerator was completely rusted. the company customer service was to send me a product (scratch b gone)to get rid of the rust, but all it did was scratch the surface and make the stainless steel front look like someone took sandpaper to the front. i wouldn't recommend this product. I'll end up buying a new fridge, by the end of year 2. so buying this product and leaving it outside in the elements of the weather will ruin your fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Pistil

customer_reviews.title: Worst refrigerator in the world.
customer_reviews.text: First time to write a review. Don't spend your money on this refrigerator nothing but problems. My family and office purchase lots of stuff from amaz on. Never had a problem like this. I repeat do not buy this refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we wanted. We live in Fl & wanted it for our balcony.
customer_reviews.author: marie L wragg

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Bull Outdoor Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Damaged upon arrival - One side at the bottom was smashed in & now it doesn't get cold. I hope I can get my money back. The instructions also state that it cannot be anywhere colder than 60 or hotter than 90, nor can it get wet. That doesn't sound like an outdoor refrigerator to me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lillivin

customer_reviews.title: Not "stainless"
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an outdoor fridge to keep near the pool. Even though it is under a patio roof after 6 months the front panel has rust spots from places where water has come into contact with the surface. Otherwise, perfectly functional fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Richie

customer_reviews.title: Quite light compared to other models!
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase the client had selected but they were very satisfied with the product. It did have a more presentable clear bottom shelf and drawer and quite a nice appearance when installed with the separate trim piece ordered from Bull also. Unit was quite light and arrived on time as promised.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

product_meta.title: Bull Outdoor Products 11001 Stainless Steel Front Panel Refrigerator
product_meta.description: The BULL Standard Refrigerator has a space saving design that will keep your beverages and food ice cold. A seven 12oz can beverage dispenser comes standard and is fully integrated into the stylish reversible stainless steel door. Weighing only 62 pounds the BULL refrigerator is perfect for your office, dorm room, back yard BBQ area, she shed, or man cave. Reversible door swing for left of right opening. CUTOUT DIMENSIONS: 20 1/2"W X 33"H X 20 3/4"D, to see spec sheets log into www. bullbbq .
feature_bullets: Reversible door - left or right swing
4. 4 cu. ft. of space to keep beverages and food ice cold

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars171 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
